definitions.definition: A heavy long-handled hammer , used for splitting logs by driving a wedge into them, or in combat.
A situation where the player carrying the ball , who must be on his feet, is held by one or more opponents, and one or more of the ball carrier's team mates bind onto the ball carrier.

main_definition: A heavy long-handled hammer , used for splitting logs by driving a wedge into them, or in combat.
secondary_definitions: ( rugby ) A situation where the player carrying the ball , who must be on his feet, is held by one or more opponents, and one or more of the ball carrier's team mates bind onto the ball carrier.
